summary: The video captures a street interview conducted by a man in a dark sweatshirt holding a microphone, engaging with various individuals on a cobblestone street during twilight. He asks questions about perfume preferences and purchases, specifically mentioning 'One Million' by Parfum One Million. The interviewee, Nikolai Karm, shares his experience with the perfume, which he received as a gift from his sister-in-law. The conversation includes discussions about the cost of perfumes and the desire to buy balloons. The interviewer also interacts with a child and a woman, who express interest in balloons. The setting is lively with people walking around, some holding drinks, and the atmosphere appears casual and friendly.
keywords: interview, perfume, One Million, Nikolai Karm, sister-in-law, gift, balloons, cost, cobblestone street, twilight, casual, friendly
